title: The Weird Room

panel_structure.description: The void transforms into a surreal academic space—philosophy, neuroscience, and metaphysics visualized as half-formed figures pacing in overlapping circles, muttering incomplete equations and paradoxes

transformation_notes: The Architect celebrates Evan's breakthrough into the deepest philosophical territory—where all disciplines converge on the mystery of consciousness without answers.
narrator_role: Guide to the weird room of consciousness
